message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product. I'm happy to offer it to you for $22,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of what's being offered.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you're placing on the product, but I'm looking for something closer to $10000. Could we perhaps meet somewhere in the middle?

Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is significantly below its true worth.  I'm willing to come down to $19,000. I'm confident you'll see this as a fair offer considering the value this product brings.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I'm still hoping for a price closer to my initial budget. How about $15000? I believe this would be a fair compromise.
